Welcome to Text Tag! This is a multiplayer, text-based Laser Tag game.

1. Create a new game, or Join an existing one using the Game List Button.

2. Take a look at the game area, and once you're ready - Start the game. . You will be assigned to a Red or Blue team: enter 'shot to eliminate an opponent. First team to reach the required score - Wins!'
